html:
SellerX, a Germany-based company that buys and builds Amazon businesses, has secured an additional USD500 million in equity and debt round led by Sofina SA, funds, and accounts managed by BlackRock, and Victory Park Capital, with participation from a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Abu Dhabi Investment Authority (ADIA), and other investors

Philipp Triebel is the co-founder of SellerX.

Deal In Brief

Deal Value (US$ Million)500
Deal TypeVenture Finance
Sub-CategoryGrowth Capital/Expansion
Deal StatusCompleted: 2021-12-09

Deal Participants

Target (Company)SellerX
Acquirer 1 (Company)Undisclosed Investor(s)
Acquirer 2 (Company)Abu Dhabi Investment Authority

Deal Rationale

This funding will help SellerX to expand its offerings.
